0.Name: Null
0.Description: A black hole with no face, no limbs, no voice, and no personality.

1.Name: Start of Heading
1.Description: An arrogant character who believes he is the most important part of any message. Best friends with Start of Text.

2.Name: Start of Text
2.Description: A character who is always texting. Similar to Start of Heading, but more laid back.

3.Name: End of Text
3.Description: Start of Text's polar opposite. She is very formal and proper, always insisting on ending conversations politely.

4.Name: End of Transmission
4.Description: Always pranking others by cutting off their messages abruptly. She loves chaos and confusion.

5.Name: Enquiry
5.Description: A curious character who is always asking questions. He is friendly and eager to learn about anything and everything.

6.Name: Acknowledge
6.Description: Very polite and always acknowledging things. It annoys the other characters that he always acknowledges the people that made it happen.

7.Name: Alert
7.Description: Always alert. Rings bells, annoys other characters. Generally unpopular among the characters.

8.Name: Backspace
8.Description: Walks backwards instead of forwards. Can go back in time. But personality-wise, he's an all-rounded nice guy.

9.Name: Character Tabulation
9.Description: Character Tabulation, or Tab for short, is a good athlete. He can jump over four spaces. He can run the distance of four spaces in a millisecond.

10.Name: End of Line
10.Description: End of Line hates, and I mean HATES, lines. He stamps on pens, causing lines to stop being drawn. Line Tabulation is his arch-enemy and they fight when possible.

11.Name: Line Tabulation
11.Description: Character Tabulation's sister who loves, and I mean LOVES, lines. End of Line is her arch-enemy and they fight when possible.

12.Name: Form Feed
12.Description: Form Feed, better known as Page Break, feeds people (in many forms) and rips pages apart. She doesn't really do much apart from that.

13.Name: Carriage Return
13.Description: A sweet character who has the power to reverse time. Also she likes doing new stuff, like creating a new line when space runs out!

14.Name: Locking-Shift One
14.Description: She is constantly mixed up with Locking-Shift Zero, her near-identical twin. This makes her very mad. and so LS0 often needs to calm her down.

15.Name: Locking-Shift Zero
15.Description: He is constantly mixed up with Locking-Shift One, his near-identical twin. This makes LS1 very mad. and so he often needs to calm her down.
